description: Complete system overview documenting the Appalachian Trail Analysis & Visualization System architecture, component relationships, and high-level data flow
Detailed documentation of core analysis algorithms including difficulty classification, hiking time estimation using Naismith's rule variants, and section difficulty analysis methodology
Comprehensive documentation of the terrain generation system, including state-specific elevation profiles, multi-frequency sine wave modeling, and geographic accuracy implementations
Documentation of the data pipeline from terrain generation through analysis to visualization, including component interactions and data transformations
Technical specifications for the visualization implementations, including elevation profiles, difficulty distribution analysis, and interactive trail mapping algorithms
